full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO'I CHOS SKYONG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
